apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple with heart emoji features two figures, a man with a dark skin tone and another with a medium-light skin tone, embraced and surrounded by a vibrant heart.  Apple's design language imbues the figures with soft rounded edges and a warm glow, while the heart itself is rendered with glossy 3D effects and bright highlights.  This emoji beautifully symbolizes love, deep connection, and partnership, conveying affection and unity in digital communication on Apple devices.
